# Kelly's Appliance Center - Full Details

> Professional appliance repair services in the Bay Area since 1975.

## Business Overview

Kelly's Appliance Center is a family-owned appliance repair company serving Sonoma, Marin, and Napa counties in Northern California. Founded in 1975, the company has over 50 years of experience providing residential appliance repair. They are factory authorized by major appliance manufacturers and hold Diamond Certified status.

## Contact Information

- **Phone**: (707) 664-9702
- **Email**: kellysappliance@gmail.com
- **Address**: 466 Primero Ct. Suite H, Cotati, CA 94931
- **Hours**: Monday-Friday 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM
- **Website**: https://kellysappliancerepair.com

## Services Offered

### Refrigerator Repair
Full-service refrigerator repair including compressor diagnostics, ice maker repair, temperature control, door seal replacement, and more. Factory authorized for major brands.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/refrigerator-repair

### Oven & Range Repair
Repair of gas and electric ovens, ranges, cooktops, and stoves. Services include element replacement, thermostat calibration, igniter repair, and control board diagnostics.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/oven-repair

### Dishwasher Repair
Complete dishwasher repair including pump replacement, spray arm repair, door latch issues, drainage problems, and control panel diagnostics.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/dishwasher-repair

### Washer & Dryer Repair
Repair of all types of washing machines and dryers including front-load, top-load, and stackable units. Services cover motor repair, drum issues, water inlet problems, and more.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/washer-dryer-repair

### Dryer Repair
Specialized dryer repair including heating element replacement, drum belt repair, thermal fuse replacement, vent cleaning, and control board repair.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/dryer-repair

### Parts
Genuine replacement parts available for most major appliance brands.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/parts

### Virtual Diagnostics
Remote video-based appliance diagnostics for initial troubleshooting before scheduling an in-home visit.
- URL: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/virtual

## Service Area Details

Kelly's Appliance Center serves a 50-mile radius from Cotati, CA, covering three counties:

### Sonoma County Cities
- Santa Rosa: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/service-locations/santa-rosa

### Napa County Cities
- Napa: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/service-locations/napa

## Credentials & Trust Signals

- **Founded**: 1975 (50+ years in business)
- **Guarantee**: 90-day money-back guarantee on all repairs
- **Diamond Certified**: Yes (highest rating for quality and service)
- **Factory Authorized**: Authorized service provider for major appliance brands
- **Licensed & Insured**: Yes

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How much does appliance repair cost?
Service call fees and repair costs vary by appliance type and issue. Visit the pricing page for current rates: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/pricing

### What brands do you service?
Kelly's Appliance Center is factory authorized for many major brands and services most residential appliance brands. See the authorized service page: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/authorized-service

### Do you offer a warranty on repairs?
Yes, all repairs come with a 90-day money-back guarantee.

### What areas do you serve?
We serve Sonoma, Marin, and Napa counties in the Bay Area, within approximately 50 miles of Cotati, CA.

### How do I schedule a repair?
Call (707) 664-9702 or visit https://kellysappliancerepair.com/contact to request an appointment.
